content: कॢप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (कल्पते, चकॢपे, अकॢपत्, अकॢप्त, अकल्पिष्ट्; कल्पिष्यते, कल्प्स्यति-ते, कल्पितुं, कल्त्पुं, कॢप्त) {@--1@} To be fit or adequate for, result in, bring about, accomplish, produce, tend to; (with <ab>dat.</ab>); कल्पसे रक्षणाय <ls>Ś. 5. 8</ls>; पश्चात्पुत्रैरपहृतभरः कल्पते विश्रमाय <ls>V. 3. 1</ls>; विभावरी यद्यरुणाय कल्पते <ls>Ku. 5. 44</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">6. 29</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">5. 79</ls>; <ls>Me. 55</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 13</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 40</ls>: <ls>Ś. 6. 23</ls>; <ls>Bk. 22. 21.</ls> {@--2@} To be well managed or regulated, to succeed. {@--3@} To become, happen, occur; कल्पिष्यते हरेः प्रीतिः <ls>Bk. 16. 12</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">9. 44</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 9.">45.</ls> {@--4@} To be prepared, be ready; चकॢपे चाश्वकुंजरं <ls>Bk. 14. 89.</ls> {@--5@} To be favourable to, subserve. {@--6@} To partake of. {@--7@} To prepare, arrange. {@--8@} To produce, cause, effect, create (with <ab>acc.</ab>). {@--9@} To accommodate one's self to. {@--10@} To fall to the share. of. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (कल्पयति-ते) {@--1@} To prepare, arrange, make ready, fit out; शयनमस्याकल्पयम् <ls>K. 156</ls>; <ls n="K.">157.</ls> {@--2@} To settle, fix upon, intend, design; कल्पिता मूल्यमेतेषां क्रूरेण भवता वयं <ls>Mu. 5. 17.</ls> {@--3@} To make, offer; <ls>Mu. 6. 20</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 28</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 51</ls>, <ls n="R. 11.">93.</ls> {@--4@} To provide or furnish with; <ls>Bh. 3. 95</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 94</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 9.</ls> {@--5@} To believe, consider, imagine, think; मत्सरस्तु मे विपरीतं कल्पयति <ls>Mu. 7</ls>; <ls>Śi. 11. 6.</ls> {@--6@} To cut, divide; <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--7@} To execute, bring about, do, perform; <ls>Śi. 11. 27</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">14. 21.</ls> {@--8@} To form, frame. {@--9@} To invent, compose (as a poem).
